page.title: 08SCHOOL PLAYGROUND GAME
page.content: To play cabbage you need from3-10 people.ITT means that someone has to catch everyone.Someone must voulunteer to go ITT.To play the person who is ITT has to close theifr eyes and stand still and then count to 100 while the people run away.You have to chances if the ITTY catches you by touching you.Then you are caught.To get free the people who are not ITT can free you by running under your arms but once you are caught stick your arms out.When your chances run out you go ITT with the ITTY until everyone is ITT.The person who was caught firstis ITTfor the next game.
